app_detail:
ğŸ”¥Would You Rather is a fun and addicting game for all genders, and all ages, where you have to choose between two difficult scenarios, top game when you are searching for things to do when bored, it will totally involve you in this game, there are a lot of enjoyable games but our game is one of the best.

Would you rather? game is a simple trivia casual game where you need to choose would you rather scenario 1 or scenario 2. This would you rather game doesn't require internet, it doesn't require wifi, it's one of the most fun games, our game is for all ages, endless of fun question games. Some questions are pretty hilarious and some are hard to choose.

Here are a load of great would you rather questions for you to enjoy. Some are ridiculous, while others are just fun to answer. Youâ€™ll find at least a few would you rather questions that are really hard to answer! This game will make you ask yourself what do you think ? Each time you play it, and of the best and funny games you can find to play, one of the best and free adicting games, and it's a couple question game, so you can play it with your partner, boyfriend/girlfriend, one of the best funny trivia games out there.

Would u rather? questions are a great way to get a conversation started in a fun and interesting way. And itâ€™s easy to get into some amazing conversations by just asking â€œwhyâ€ after a would you rather question. Youâ€™ll get some really interesting answers and probably learn a lot more about the person you are talking to, this app game is one of the top addicting free games, one of the best addicting games for free, ice breaker questions.

ğŸ”¥Our game contains hundreds of our best would you rather questions, from all categories, Funny, Scary, Hilarious, Shocking situations, date, and relationship etc... it contains a lot of dating game questions, you can play it with your husband, wife, girlfriend or boyfriend, a lot of fun questions, awesome and fun trivia game, it's a couple quiz game.

This includes some questions about your partner, girlfriend or boyfriend, love and sexual questions, about different sex scenarios, superhero questions, like would you rather be a superhero in which movie or TV show?! Or who would you date?

Would you rather is a trivia and funny game, just like guess the logo game, guess the song game, or like true or false game, but our game of course is really addictive and more fun, hilarious but at the same time there are scary questions! Addicting and funny just like any trivia quiz game or any funny games.

ğŸ”¥This app contains hundreds of the best hand picked questions, one of the best and fun addicting games you can ever find!
